202211下，t a o宝，支付宝红包，杉果，本平台，本平台充值折扣掉卡，indie gala，fanatical，humble，daily indie game，loot boy，它处自定义包入的本体约3元。爱人如己，目前就这，看以后追评。有中文的游戏请耐心自研体验乐趣，攻略指南尽量不用。不建议使用外挂，插件，作弊之类的，游戏都要这样搞，那现实里那更是如此了。兄弟萌，强烈建议不要第三方平台的小店买y u额，通过饰品等挂steam市场转的，高概率red信乃至封号，且行且珍惜。

author: {'steamid': '76561198030784015', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11208, 'playtime_forever': 225, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 225, 'last_played': 1537270397}
review:
Gear Gauntlet is a console ported 2D endless runner.   There's no platforming mechanics here, instead you simply move up and down (and backwards and forwards) as the screen flies by.  If ]you get stuck against a wall when it scrolls off screen, you die.   If you survive, you "win", although perhaps "winning" here is generous.  You play a cog spinning wildly, which is probably entertaining for someone but not sure who.  What do you want to be when you grow up? A cog!

Technically the game has a lot of issues that fall below minimum required standard for PC.  The console port is badly done.  While the game runs smoothly, you have fixed resolution and can't remap your controls.   Developers need to learn the PC is not another console, and not every PC gamer has an Xbox gamepad plugged in.   $7 is an unforgivable price to charge for a bad console port, especially when they're competing at the very bottom of the gaming ecosystem against games like  Flappy Bird and Temple Runner.

author: {'steamid': '76561197970900751', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 121, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 121, 'last_played': 1478212721}
review: This game looked fun and unique. I saw the reviews and found that Windows Central rated it 4/5 for the XBox. So for under $5 I decided to give it a try....and I'm glad I did. Frantic, Crazy, Chaotic, Frustrating. I kept dying....and dying....and dying. But, I kept trying....and trying....just one more level...one more....one more. Crazy Fun Game....even has a global leaderboard.
